funding-group.funding-statement: This research was funded by Defense Threat Reduction Agency contract HDTRA1–12-C-0061. LK, SF, and NM received support in the form of salary from the commercial company, The Charles Stark Draper Laboratory ( https://www.draper.com/). The funders did not have any additional role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript. The specific roles of these authors are articulated in the ‘author contributions’ section.
